attributes.action: Making busking free in Uxbridge or a yearly license and support local musicians
attributes.additional_details: Street entertainment offers small towns live music and supports independent artists to help grow. It should be looked at as a positive, charging £37.50 for a 2 hour slot is unethical and near enough impossible. Music should be encouraged it’s freedom of speech and also connects with passers who often spend money in local establishments and want to find out more about the artists performing.
attributes.background: Allow for street entertainment in Uxbridge to be either free or a yearly license fee rather than £37.50 for 2 hours

rejection.details: You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
